0.name: Baddies! Trouble!
0.fullDesc: Deals {{2}} instance(s) of DMG, with each instance dealing Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> of Mem's ATK to one random enemy. At the end, deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Mem's ATK to all enemies.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG that Bounces a total of <orangeStrong>{{2}}</orangeStrong> time(s). Deals minor Ice DMG to all enemies at the end.

1.name: Lemme! Help You!
1.fullDesc:
Advances the action of one designated ally by {{3, percent}}% and grants them "Mem's Support," lasting for {{2}} turn(s).
For every 1 instance of DMG dealt by a target that has "Mem's Support," additionally deals 1 instance of True DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of the original DMG.
When using this ability on this unit, cannot trigger the action advance effect.
1.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Advances the action</orangeStrong> of one ally and grants "Mem's Support": Additionally deals <orangeStrong>True DMG</orangeStrong> after dealing DMG.

0.name: Friends! Together!
0.fullDesc:
Increases all allies' CRIT DMG by an amount equal to {{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}% of Mem's CRIT DMG plus {{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%.
If the Charge has yet to reach 100%, Mem automatically uses "Baddies! Trouble!" when taking action. When the Charge reaches 100%, Mem immediately takes action. In the next action, can select one ally and use "Lemme! Help You!".
0.shortDesc:
Increases all allies' CRIT DMG.
When taking action, automatically attacks. If the Charge reaches 100%, then immediately takes action and can use a new ability: Advances the action of one ally and deals True DMG.

1.name: Go, Mem, Go!
1.fullDesc: When Mem is summoned, immediately gains {{1, percent}}% Charge.

2.name: No... Regrets
2.fullDesc: When Mem disappears, Trailblazer's action advances by {{1, percent}}%.
2.shortDesc: Upon disappearing, advances the action of Trailblazer.
